attributes.action: stop allowing his ministers to feather thier nests using public money
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the increasing incidents of government ministers and mp's using our money for items they should be paying for out of thier own pockets is alarming, to suggest they misunderstood the rules is an insult to the british public and smacks of greed

rejection.details: The Prime Minister and Government do not control the pay or allowances of MPs - the current system is administered by the House of Commons. Therefore the Number 10 website can not accept any petitions relating to MPs’ expenses.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
